awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins.

fullplot: In 1930s New Orleans, the Cincinnati Kid, a young stud poker player who travels from one big game to the next, stopping along the way up with various girls, is pitted against the legendary champion card-sharp Lancey Howard in a high-stakes poker game.
plot: An up-and-coming poker player tries to prove himself in a high-stakes match against a long-time master of the game.
title: The Cincinnati Kid
